content:
I’m a research fellow at the Department of Data Science and AI, Monash University.
I’m interested in machine learning and deep learning, particularly representation learning for unstructured data, e.g., documents and natural languages and structured data, e.g., graphs via probabilistic approaches with deep learning, such as Bayesian statistics and optimal transport.
I obtained my PhD, Master, and Bachelor degrees from Monash University (2019), Nanjing University, and Nankai University, respectively.
ðŸ‘‹ Check out our recent Tutorial on Optimal Transport for Unsupervised Learning at Asian Conference on Machine Learning ( ACML) 2021.
